name: Chain React TD
description:
How to play:

WASD or Arrow keys - move player

Left click - attack; places towers if selected for construction

Right click - open construction menu or cancels construction

Q/E or mouse wheel to rotate towers for construction

The triggers on a tower needs to be attacked in order to make the tower shoot.

Clicking the "Start Wave" button will make enemies come towards your core, remember to build defenses where they are coming from first.
